title: How to Make Easter S'mores With Peeps

steps.headline: Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C) while you break each graham cracker in half and place them on a cookie sheet.
Place a piece (or more) of chocolate on top of each cracker.
Put one peep on top of each chocolate piece.
Cover the S’more with the remaining piece of graham cracker to form a chocolate and Peep sandwich.
Bake the S’mores for 3 to 5 minutes.
Remove the cookie tray from the oven and use a spatula to remove the treats from the baking sheet.
Put the treats on serving plates and let them cool before serving.

text: Preheat your oven to 350°F (180°C) while you break each graham cracker in half and place them on a cookie sheet.  Place a piece (or more) of chocolate on top of each cracker.  Put one peep on top of each chocolate piece.  Cover the S’more with the remaining piece of graham cracker to form a chocolate and Peep sandwich.  Bake the S’mores for 3 to 5 minutes.  Remove the cookie tray from the oven and use a spatula to remove the treats from the baking sheet.  Put the treats on serving plates and let them cool before serving.
